welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Groningen, Suriname! Get ready to experience the charming city known for its vibrant culture and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Groningen has to offer."

restaurants.name: River Breeze
restaurants.description: River Breeze is a indonesian restaurant located in Saramacca.

restaurants.description: Oso Faja Lobi is a restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zanderij International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zanderij International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
